title: Meditation Tools
author: Airio
cleaned_text: I purchased 3 of these to put in my room, on display. 3 of them to me represents the three pyramids of Giza, Egypt. It is a REALLY cool idea :) Green Aventurine Carved Cactus I am so glad to make this purchase as it fosters my belief of an Elven fantasy that I used to have. As an Elv named Leo, this necklace makes me feel charmed and happy - I like wearing it... it has strong supernatural power & energy inwards, within the crystal realm of the clear gem-stone.... <3 Smells wonderful! I am completely pleased with my purchase. I visited this store while on a trip and now rely on it as a go-to online crystal shop. The quality is top notch, and the photos are very accurate. Shipping is quick, affordable and care is taken with packing. Crystal Magic consistently offers authentic products at a
